mapper.select: SELECT cd.vip_card_id vipCardId, cd.card_no vipCardNo, cd.name vipCardName, cc.image_url imageUrl, uvc.balance, uvc.primary_flag primaryFlag, uvc.create_time createTime FROM t_user_vip_card uvc LEFT JOIN t_vip_card cd on uvc.vip_card_id = cd.vip_card_id LEFT JOIN t_card_cover cc on cd.card_cover_id = cc.card_cover_id where 1 = 1 and uvc.user_id = #{value}
